messages.title: Personal Message From Martin Vickers
messages.content: If re-elected in May, Martin looks forward to continuing to serve the people of the Cleethorpes Constituency. Martin has been privileged to serve as your Member of Parliament for the last five years and has been determinedly tenacious and much-better to deliver the best results that ensure the improvement of the national economy on down to local level.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Making hard working families more secure
Delivering security and choice for pensioners
Maintain and improve local NHS services
Keep Britain safe from internal and external threats
Fight to Preserve Green Field Sites
Better Rail Links for the Constituency

leaflet.personalStatement: Over the last five years your Member of Parliament has been centrally to every best deed to solve all can be assured that I will continue to do the national economy if our community, administrative is essential government funding, that improvement projects provide the help support to you and more vulnerable in our community need.

politicalExperience.achievements: Played a part in infrastructure projects for major industry through the Regional Growth Fund. Achievements include updating the Humber Bridge tolls, halving of the A160, the Immingham by-pass, maintaining our rail links to Manchester Airport, big increases in the number of apprenticeships and major investments particularly in the off-shore renewables sector.

images.caption: Martin at the Railway Library in Immingham

leaflet.additionalNotes: This leaflet provides an overview of Martin Vickers' priorities and accomplishments, highlighting his desire to continue serving the Cleethorpes Constituency and maintain government funds to support improvements.
